content.html: I just read a blog post of a dev dunking on a piece of "getting started" hooks code and using it as an example of why hooks are awful. I just don't know how some people find the time in the day for these things.
content.value:
I just read a blog post of a dev dunking on a piece of "getting started" hooks code and using it as an example of why hooks are awful.

I just don't know how some people find the time in the day for these things.
